data.title: Patti D'Arbanville
data.text:
Born: 25-May-1951

Birthplace: New York City

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Rose Boscorelli on Third Watch

Boyfriend: Cat Stevens (singer, dated 1970s)

Husband: Roger Mirmont (actor, m. 1976, div. 1977)

Husband: Steve Curry (m. 1980, div. 1981)

Boyfriend: Don Johnson (actor, dated 1981-85, one son)

Son: Jesse Wayne Johnson (b. 7-Dec-1982)

Husband: Terry Quinn (NYC firefighter, m. 15-Jun-1993, div. 2000, two daughters, one son)

Daughter: Emmelyn

Daughter: Alexandra

Son: Liam

TELEVISION

The Guiding Light Selena Davis (1998-2000)

Wiseguy Amber Twine (1989)
